page.title: 13 GAMES WE PLAY
page.content: Out of school we join with friends or parents to enjoy badminton,squash, swimming,running,rugby,cricket and tennis and some of us enjoy individual activities such as karate.With friends we play snooker,table tennis,board or pencil and paper games or enjoy BMX bike races. Games we play in school vary according to our age or the season of the year.They include: Ball games, e.g.fire ball,3 bad eggs,tennis, rounders,Queenie,Queenie,Football; and skipping games e.g.bumper car, Sea shells,high & low,French skipping; and group games e.g.Fairies,Witches, Stuck in the Mud,Chain tag, Red Rover. Some of our favourites are Bulldogs, Mob,and King ball.
